text: 7.5 Lom 6.13, 6.21, Gal 5.19, Jem 1.15 Ned mubwak gos nab ayaŋ nedil chɨn ke ak kɨdek golɨgɨpun won ak, takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak chɨnop gak. Chɨnop gek, gos tɨmud tɨmel anɨb ak tɨkjakek golɨgɨpun. Anɨgek, chɨn tap si tap tɨmel golɨgɨpun. Pen anɨgolɨgɨpun anɨb ak chɨnop gek, pel kumolɨgɨpun.
